summary: texture replacer for the red lich
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][color=#980000][size=5]UNDEATH LICH HD
[/size][/color][/font]I was tired to look at my lich character and notice how he is ugly compared to my heavly modded High-Res game so......I've done a retexture (2k) for the red version only,  using the stunning [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6781714]Kajuan[/url]'s draugr and dragon priest textures as a base for that ^^
I'm planning to do the black and white ones too so check for updates!
author: Mitsurai
